pages.text: $(li)The Illagers Mines are used by the Illagers to get all the minerals that they need.$(br)$(li)They like to get all this stuff fast, that explains all the TNT that you can found in this place.$(br)$(li)Be careful, the Pillagers and the Miners will not hesistate to attack you to defend their resources.
$(li)The Illager Mine can be found in the Desert, Mesa, Mushroom Forest and Savanna biomes.
